name: Get to the Escape Pod pls
name_original: Get to the Escape Pod pls
description:
Game Play video 



This Side Scroller where you're a spacer who's minding his own business, and trying to get to the Escape pod, because the game designer said please. Which is a fair enough reason. You must platform your way through very few obstacles to get to the escape pod, can you do it? We shall find out!

all Assets were created by me a Solo Dev, https://www.artstation.com/poidahoita
apart from:

Sound effects from the Gamemaster Audio - ProSound Mini Pack.

Art assets created from, Maya LT, Zbrush, Substance Designer, Painter, 

Character sculpted in Zbrush, retopo'd in Maya, baked in Marmoset toolbag, textured in Substance Painter, rigged, animated in Akeytsu. 

Game programmed in Unreal Engine 4.
